verses.verse: <S%H835>Blessed<s%> is the <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H1980>walks<s%> not in the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of the <S%H7563>ungodly,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5975>stands<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H2400>sinners,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H3427>sits<s%> in the <S%H4186>seat<s%> of the <S%H3887>scornful.<s%>
But his <S%H2656>delight<s%> is in the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and in his <S%H8451>law<s%> does he <S%H1897>meditate<s%> <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night.<s%>

And he shall be like a <S%H6086>tree<s%> <S%H8362>planted<s%> by the <S%H6388>rivers<s%> of <S%H4325>water,<s%> that <S%H5414>brings<s%> <S%H5414>forth<s%> his <S%H6529>fruit<s%> in his <S%H6256>season;<s%> his <S%H5929>leaf<s%> also shall not <S%H5034>wither;<s%> and <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H834><s%> he <S%H6213>does<s%> shall <S%H6743>prosper.<s%>
The <S%H7563>ungodly<s%> are not <S%H3651>so:<s%> but are like the <S%H4671>chaff<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H7307>wind<s%> <S%H5086>drives<s%> away.

<S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> the <S%H7563>ungodly<s%> shall not <S%H6965>stand<s%> in the <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> nor <S%H2400>sinners<s%> in the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous.<s%>
For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous:<s%> but the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H7563>ungodly<s%> shall <S%H6>perish.<s%>
